Brand Assets

Last Updated September 9, 2016

Thanks for your interest in Jonah Levi. We have a few guidelines for using our brand resources—please take a moment to familiarize yourself with them. You can download individual assets in each section. If you want everything, use the button below to download a .zip file.

Download All Assets

This is a friendly legal reminder that these graphics are proprietary and protected under intellectual property laws. Please do not:

  • Display these graphics in a way that implies a relationship, affiliation, or endorsement by Jonah Levi of your product, service, or business.
  • Use these graphics as part of your own product, business, or service's name.
  • Alter these graphics in any way, or combine them with any other graphics, without written consent from Jonah Levi.
Thanks for not editing, changing, distorting, recoloring, or reconfiguring the logo.

Logo

Our logo comes in two variations. The Jonah Levi logo can either be displayed with or without its tag-line "Diamanten". While you may use "Jonah Levi Diamanten" and "Jonah Levi Diamonds" interchangeably, you may not alter the wordmark to anything other than presented below.

Please do not embellish on the logo with shadows, patterns, intricate backgrounds, or other manipulations.

Corporate Colors

We use Tundora or Lighter Tundora copy on pure white background with small accents of Jonah Levi Lilac and Haze. Alabaster is the color of our wordmark on the Jonah Levi Lilac background.

Jonah Levi Lilac
HEX #D2C1E0
RGB 210, 193, 224
CMYK 6, 14, 0, 12
Alabaster
HEX #F9F9F9
RGB 249, 249, 249
CMYK 0, 0, 0, 2
Tundora
HEX #4A4A4A
RGB 74, 74, 74
CMYK 0, 0, 0, 71
Lighter Tundora
HEX #6D6A72
RGB 109, 106, 114
CMYK 4, 7, 0, 55
Haze
HEX #ECEDED
RGB 236, 237, 237
CMYK 0, 0, 0, 7
